TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASIs part of connector : ZAPLINK_DICTIONARY ASDefine XML structure of a Type group U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS U1Memories ASThis application is dedicated to the memories of : B2My father : Lamri BENSIALI (1940-2004) without whom I never started programming B2My uncle : Jacky BEDU (1934-2009) who died during the completion of this application

ITEM.TEXT: Line Type for Table with Package Data

LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY TYPE DECLARATIONS (CLASS *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* IMPLEMENTATION OR PRIVATE METHOD'S SIGNATURE
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* LOCAL CLASS IMPLEMENTATION FOR PUBLIC CLASS *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* LOCAL HELPER CLASSES
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* USE THIS SOURCE FILE FOR ANY MACRO DEFINITIONS YOU NEED *"* IN THE IMPLEMENTATION PART OF THE CLASS

ITEM.TEXT: Get source attribute as standard table

ITEM.SOURCE: ` SPLIT me->source AT cl_abap_char_utilities=>newline INTO TABLE source.

ITEM.TEXT: Set source attribute from standard table

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_data, name TYPE typegroup, lang TYPE langu, text TYPE ddtext, devclass TYPE devclass, uccheck TYPE uccheck, END OF ts_data
tt_abapsource type standard table of ABAPSOURCE with DEFAULT KEY
tt_string type standard table of ABAPSOURCE with DEFAULT KEY
